entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Bernières
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:55 a.m. EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sainte-Foy - Laval University 8:00 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
Temperature: -5.9°C
Humidity: 71 %
Dewpoint: -10.3°C
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Monday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow at times mixed with rain beginning early this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 15 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or rain ending overnight then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm over northern sections. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High 8.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 8. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
